response.original_title: Bunch of Friends: We Have 24 Hours to Eat This Skateboard
response.overview: A short cinematic masterpiece in which Bunch of Friends set out on a quest to Eat a Skateboard in 24 Hours. An epic, dramatic and comedic short film.
response.tagline: EAT THE HOTTEST PEPPER IN THE WORLD!!!
response.title: Bunch of Friends: We Have 24 Hours to Eat This Skateboard
